description: Talks between Vladimir Putin and Donald Trump on the war in Ukraine are set to take place in Alaska next Friday. Europe has insisted that Ukraine and European powers should be part of any deal to end the conflict.

headline: More and more Ethiopians are risking their lives at sea in attempts to reach Yemen
description: On August 3, at least 90 migrants died when their boat sank in the Gulf of Aden. All of them hailed from Ethiopia's Tigray region, which has been plagued by ongoing political instability after two years of civil war.

description: 22 years after the original hit, the film uses the same formula and the same leads for a feel-good movie that offers no surprises.

headline: In Israel, ultra-Orthodox Jews are opposing Netanyahu to avoid conscription
description: Several thousand men protested on Thursday, answering the call of rabbis advocating religious disobedience and rejecting military conscription. The prime minister's coalition is under strain.
